Posts.Content: The lump has sorted of gone down to half the size it was now and deflated if that makes any sense. It's my third day since I stopped my period. Do you think this points more towards a cyst? Thank you for all the lovely advice and comments. I honestly can't think of a time where I have been this scared in my life. Kelly
Posts.Title: Deflated lump

Posts.Content: Argghh I have set up a new post somehow ;-/
